data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Technology enables students today to learn more information and to learn more quickly. Do you agree or disagree? Why? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: When it comes to the effect of technology on students' learning, people's notions vary from one another. As far as I am concerned, technology can largely facilitate students' learning. To begin with, it is commonly acknowledged that technology enables students to learn a much broader spectrum of information. For example, students today have access to any kind of information they are interested in via the super-fast internet. On top of that, the electronic devices students use to access information also serve a number of useful functions, such as taking pictures and notes, which can greatly facilitate their learning. To conclude, technology enables students today to learn more information and to learn more quickly. (113字)
